Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus places you in the heart of Istanbul, walking distance from Macka Park and Istanbul Lutfi Kirdar Convention and Exhibition Centre. This 5-star hotel is close to Topkapi Palace and Suleymaniye Mosque.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 499 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including outdoor tennis courts, a health club, and an outdoor pool. Additional features include concierge services, supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 1 PM
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including outdoor tennis courts, a health club, and an outdoor pool. Additional features include concierge services, supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.
Make yourself at home in one of the 499 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets.

A stay at Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus places you in the heart of Istanbul, walking distance from Macka Park and Istanbul Lutfi Kirdar Convention and Exhibition Centre. This 5-star hotel is close to Topkapi Palace and Suleymaniye Mosque.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Macka Park - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Istanbul Lutfi Kirdar Convention and Exhibition Centre - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Military Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Istanbul Military Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Cemal Resit Rey Concert Hall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
BJK Inonu Stadium - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Istanbul Technical University - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Taksim Gezi Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Ataturk Cultural Center - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Taksim Square - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Taksim Republic Art Gallery - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Istiklal Avenue - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Dolmabahce Palace - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Akbank Culture and Arts Centre - 1 km / 0.7 mi
Amerikan Hospital - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus is Istanbul (IST-Ataturk Intl.) - 16 km / 10 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Istanbul Hilton is Istanbul (IST-Ataturk Intl.) - 16 km / 10 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
